author: jwasinger
content: <@796570016966770688> I'm looking into the test failures in Geth.  I think there is an error in eest and other clients:  in the case where a create targets an account that already exists, the account is not being included as a read in the BAL.  Example of this is `paris/eip7610_create_collision/initcollision/init_collision_create_tx.json` where the account `0bd9880ecaea49ad90b4f001d4fe4c1930d18d67` is the target of a creation, which fails because there is already a contract at that address.

author: m0_ox
content: hmm which test release are you testing against? Is this the latest?

author: jwasinger
content: oh.. I'm a few release behind

author: jwasinger
content: Based on my investigation of the test failures in Geth, it's also possible that this is a bug in Geth (call didn't have enough gas to actually read the target account, and Geth erroneously does anyway).
